topic.title: Any filesharing zero sites?
topic.body:
I've been looking for a torrent or something of the new Inside game for days but have been unsuccessful since kat.ph went down (kickasstorrents), anyone able to share a source for a cracked version or anything?

Also general filesharing zero site thread

2_1JXFzMzrQTJCiGw36YNQGg2Tmt1hTHy7ZT.body: Just found Zeronet looking for Inside torrents... doesn't look like it's much help but, the concept looks cool I guess.

1_1NpaQyMLjikY9FXdfyG4p8CNmS2YrupsRR.body:
> [set](#comment_3_1NpaQyMLjikY9FXdfyG4p8CNmS2YrupsRR): 127.0.0.1:43110/ZeroTorrent.bit/?Page:zite-list-blogs

Also unfortunately Inside is not on the torrent database there yet...

1_19GDcmuGz3D2epgu9k65yMY9WMYDG8eZCP.body:
> [methodx](#comment_6_1CFhytwoGGPNqmueehPqotaf2iG9uxD98e): ZeroTorrent is just a clone of ZeroTalk. I'm sure we all appreciate the efforts of the curator, but it's not a native torrenting site. ZeroNet needs a Kickass Torrents clone or at least something with a decent UI. PLAY is a good start.

?

Have you looked at ZeroTorrents? It's literally a torrent website for everything. ZeroPlay is also extremely good for movies, just finished watching a 720p quality version of The Angry Birds movie off of it. There are comment sections on torrents, all we need is a rating system on them and we're set to be like kickasstorrents.

1_1MZ697S3uwCpZD4zSq51NHJDrj7CWxsmd3.body: There is an extremely large comic reading community on the internet. I have no idea how to do any of this but I SUPPORT IT
